div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.h3: Maintaining Connections and Engaging with Your Students Through Distance Learning

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: We are working to add new content to this website, so please check back for updates!

div.p: Our hope is for this website to aid teachers, administrators and support staff in the planning process of distance learning and to provide support to you so that you may stay connected and engaged with your students.

span.em: Disclaimer: Any linked sites are for the convenience of you, the user, and the content of any outside websites
is not monitored by Shasta County Office of Education

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.em: does not condone content that is obscene, libelous or slanderous, does not promote illegal activities, threaten the safety of others, or create a clear and present danger of inciting students or others to commit unlawful acts, violate school rules, or disrupt the school's orderly operation. This website shall not be used for commercial purposes, advertising or sales. Use of this website is at the user's own risk.
